amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit any funds authorized in the bill from being used to sponsor Army National Guard professional wrestling sports sponsorships or motor sports sponsorships but did not seek to prohibit recruiters from making direct personal contact with secondary school students and other prospective recruits.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to prohibit any funds authorized in the bill from being used to sponsor Army National Guard professional wrestling sports sponsorships or motor sports sponsorships. The amendment does not prohibit recruiters from making direct, personal contact with secondary school students and other prospective recruits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 290 (Roll no. 231).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McCollum amendment (A018) Failed by recorded vote: 134 - 290 (Roll no. 231).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A018) offered by Ms. McCollum.
